name: Sigurd's Revenge
description:
Press X to shoot

Press Z to jump

Double tap Z to reverse Gravity

Sigurd wants his revenge on Fenrir for killing his family. Enter the oberos and face off against fenrir!

An arcade style game made in 3 days.

Credits:
